p: Composition of the mycorrhizal plant community (Fig. 2a) differed between the garlic mustard ambient and garlic mustard weeded treatments. Conversely, the non‐mycorrhizal plant community did not differ significantly between treatments (Fig. 2b). Community composition of both functional groups (mycorrhizal and non‐mycorrhizal) also changed over time (Appendix S1: Fig. S1), However, we found no significant interaction between community composition and year in either functional group.
